name: places/ChIJcaPI8HVZwokR5ujPXu9TJAI
adrFormatAddress: 226 1st Ave., New York, NY 10009, USA

editorialSummary.text: Stalwart, unfussy jewelry store with a variety of costume & upscale necklaces, rings & pendants.

originalText.text:
I had an amazing experience at Kathe's Jewelry. I got watch as a gift and needed to adjust the strap as it was too long for my wrist.
The work was done beautiful. I was kindly advised how many pieces should be removed. And now the watch fits so perfectly I can’t take my eyes of it.
But it's also the atmosphere. Very kind people work there and I'm so grateful to them.
I hope your business will prosper!
Thank you so much

originalText.text: What an amazing shop! This was my first time working with a jeweler, and I still cannot imagine a better experience. I  recently ordered two rings online and vastly over measured the size of my fingers. I went in and they found my true measurements. The cheaper of the two was an easy and quick fix, he added a bar and made it adjustable. The second, and more expensive of the two, was ~way~ too big, and has beautiful detail work all around the band. I left it with them for about a week and the fix was SEAMLESS. It looks amazing and fits perfectly, and it was also ~incredibly~ well priced. I would have paid two or three times as much without blinking. The attached photos detail the amount of material they had to remove and then reattach. Thank you so much for the beautiful work, I will not be going anywhere else for my future jewelry needs.

originalText.text:
We had a lovely experience here. Brought in a ring to be resized, and Jonas was extremely friendly and welcoming. He helped us find the right size, and then actually encouraged us to reach out to the original jeweler about getting the right size instead of resizing. He explained that the only way to resize this particular ring would not yield very satisfactory results, so it should only be done as a last measure.

We very much appreciated his professionalism, friendly disposition, and honesty! We will definitely be back in the future for further jewelry needs. What a lovely guy.

originalText.text:
I went here to get a ring resized. The owner was very friendly, making sure I was comfortable with both the sizing of the ring and the overall experience. My new ring was ready in less than 24 hours, but they were kind enough to hold onto it for me over the weekend.

My ring fit perfectly! It was also wholesome to hear about the origins of this family business. For quality  services and beautiful jewelry at a great rate in NYC, come to Kathe’s! Right off the 1st Avenue stop on the L.

originalText.text: My girlfriend and I had an amazing experience here. I proposed to her today and we needed the ring fitted, we came in an hour before close and Jonas made sure we had the fitted ring ready by close because we're leaving NY tomorrow. The ring fits perfect and everyone was beyond helpful we definitely would recommend this place to anyone looking for beautiful jewelry or needing something fitted. Thank you so much.
